scp.message: Is This an SAP Business Technology Platform System?

ui5AbapRepo.messageMaxLength: SAPUI5 ABAP Repository (maximum length: 15 characters) must start with {{ applicationPrefix }}.
ui5AbapRepo.hint: Enter the name for the deployed application. The name must follow the rules of creating a BSP application. It must not exceed 15 characters and must consist of alphanumeric characters or underscores only. The name must be unique in the BSP repository and its namespace must be compatible with the selected package.

description.hint: The description of the deployed application.

packageInputChoice.message: Select How You Want to Enter the Package

packageManual.hint: Provide a package for the deployed application.

packageAutocomplete.hint: Select a package for the deployed application.
packageAutocomplete.sourceMessage: More than {{numResults}} results. Keep typing to narrow down the list.

common.provideTransportRequest: Provide a transport request for your application.

transportInputChoice.message: Select How You Want to Enter the Transport Request

overwrite.message: Editing the deployment configuration will overwrite the existing configuration. Are you sure you want to continue?
overwrite.hint: Deployment config will abort if you choose no. Click 'Finish' to abort.

warnings.packageNotFound: The package list cannot be fetched. Please enter the package manually.
warnings.transportConfigFailure:
Cannot retrieve the transport configuration from the backend. You can still proceed with adding a deployment configuration by manually providing the package and transport request. 
For more information on this error, please see Guided Answers {{-helpLink}}.
warnings.noTransportReqs: There are no transport requests for the supplied package. You can choose to create a new one now or during deployment.
warnings.noExistingTransportReqList: The transport request list cannot be fetched. Please enter the transport request manually.
warnings.virtualHost: As the destination is using a virtual host, when viewing your deployed application in the browser, replace the host URL with the internal host that is configured with your SAP Cloud Connector.
warnings.allowingUnauthorizedCertsNode: Setting the `NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED` environment variable to `0` makes TLS connections and HTTPS requests insecure by disabling certificate verification. It is important to understand the security risks when using this setting.
warnings.certificateError: A certificate error occurred when connecting to the host: {{-url}}. Certificate error: {{error}}.

errors.abapSystemChoices: Failed to retrieve ABAP system choices.
errors.targetNotDeployable: {{systemError}} To continue with project generation, choose a different deployment target or skip adding a deployment configuration.
errors.cannotReadCapServiceMetadata: An error occurred reading CAP service metadata: {{serviceName}}. For more information, view the log.
errors.invalidClient: [{{client}}] is invalid. Enter blank or a value between 000-999.
errors.debugAbapTargetSystem: An error occurred when retrieving the ABAP target system during {{method}}. Error: {{error}}
errors.s4SystemNoExtensible: SAP S4/HANA system not configured as an extensibility development system. Cannot deploy to it.
errors.incorrectAtoSettings: Incorrect ATO settings. Package or prefix settings missing.
errors.atoUnauthorisedSystem: Authentication required to access the ATO Service.
errors.createTransportReqFailed: Create new transport request failed. Please enter the transport request manually.
errors.requireCredentials: Please provide credentials to authenticate with the back-end system.

validators.appNameRequired: The application name is required. Enter an application name.
validators.appNameInvalid: The application name is invalid. Check your application name is correct.
validators.appNameInvalidLength: The application name cannot exceed 15 characters. Entered {{length}}.
validators.appNameInvalidPrefix: The application name must be prefixed with [{{prefix}}].
validators.abapAppDescLength: The deployment description must not exceed 60 characters.
validators.abapTransportNumRequired: Provide a transport request for your application
validators.abapPackageInvalidFormat: The package name does not match the expected format. The expected format is `/<namespace>/<package_name>` or a package name. If a namespace is not specified, the package name must start with '$', 'Z', 'Y', or 'SAP'.
validators.abapPackageStartingPrefix: The package must start with either a namespace, '$', 'Z', 'Y', or 'SAP'.
validators.abapInvalidNamespaceLength: The namespace cannot exceed 10 characters. You entered {{length}}.
validators.abapInvalidAppNameLength: The application name cannot exceed 15 characters. You entered {{length}}.
validators.abapInvalidAppName: The application name must be prefixed with [{{prefix}}].
validators.charactersForbiddenInAppName: Only alphanumeric, underscore, and slash characters are allowed.
validators.charactersForbiddenInPackage: Only alphanumeric, underscore, $, and slash characters are allowed.
validators.invalidNamespace: The namespace is invalid because there are too many forward slashes.
validators.forbiddenCharacters: Only alphanumeric, underscore, and slash characters are allowed.
validators.descriptionLength: Deployment Description must not exceed 60 characters
validators.transportListPreReqs: Name (SAPUI5 ABAP Repository) and Package are required to retrieve existing transport requests.
validators.abapInvalidAppNameNamespaceOrStartingPre: The SAPUI5 ABAP Repository and Package must start in the same way. Use either a namespace or capital letters: 'Z', 'Y' or 'SAP'.
validators.invalidCloudPackage: The provided package is not intended for cloud deployment.
validators.invalidOnPremPackage: The provided package is not intended for on-premise deployments.
validators.invalidOnPremSystem: You have selected a cloud system but you previously created a project residing on an on-premise system. Please select an on-premise system to proceed with the deployment.
validators.invalidCloudSystem: You have selected an on-premise system but you previously created a project residing on a cloud system. Please select a cloud system to proceed with the deployment.
